org.forgerock.openam.utils

Class JsonValueBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.utils.JsonValueBuilder

  • public final class JsonValueBuilder
extends Object
    Builder factory class for a fluent way of creating JsonValue objects.

    • Method Summary
